title: (x) elusive "airabia.com" logo humanist sans - Myriad {Raph}
content:
This one is proving to be very elusive.

I thought it would be a match for ITC Symbol but it is not. Also tried Metro Gothic and Swank Gothic from BA Graphics.....but no luck.

Any help would be much appreciated.

Thanks

B

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v319/windchill/arabia\_air.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626112046/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v319/windchill/arabia_air.jpg "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v319/windchill/arabia\_air.jpg")

 [‹ How to work better](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626112046/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28928 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sans from "Masculin Feminin” French film (Jean Luc Godard) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626112046/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28929 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cobramist

comments.content: Raph, I’d agree — here it is set in [Myriad](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626112046/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.125560.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=60&sampleText=airarabia.com&sampleSize=48).

Thank you guys. SUper info.

Cheers  
Brian
